item.description: His self-hype is out of touch with reality. Is this salvageable?

item.description: The S&P 500 just posted its best May since 1990.

item.description: Insider CEOs slightly outperform outsiders, but many boards value external experiences.

item.title: Why Doesn’t Mark Cuban Dress for Success? Because You Should ‘Beware the Person in the T-shirt’
item.description: ‘Shark Tank’ Shark Robert Herjavec on why the worst-dressed person in the room is often the most powerful.
